ingredient_list: ½ teaspoon ground dried chipotle pepper
directions_instructions: Combine turkey, vinegar, chili powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, sweet paprika, salt, cumin, coriander, Mexican oregano, dried chipotle pepper, cinnamon, and cloves in a mixing bowl. Mix well.
Refrigerate at least 1 hour for flavors to blend. Store in the refrigerator or freeze until ready to use.
nutrition_summary: 180 calories; protein 23g; carbohydrates 2.3g; fat 9g; cholesterol 83.6mg; sodium 511.6mg. Full Nutrition
